name: v0.2.2
body:
## What's Changed
* docs: overhaul documentation by @tylerslaton in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/167
* add python example by @cloudnautique in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/162
* feat: Add -C to change cwd of GPTScript process by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/168
* feat: Add --confirm to prompt for destructive behavior by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/171
* fix: address issue with favicon being incorrect by @tylerslaton in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/166
* chore: change tool names to be more LLM friendly by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/172
* Fix: fix existing examples to be able to use remote tools by @StrongMonkey in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/170
* Fix: add additional prompt to perform task one by one. by @StrongMonkey in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/161


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/compare/v0.2.1...v0.2.2

name: v0.2.1
body:
## What's Changed
* docs: add full 'hello world' Python example by @g-linville in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/156
* docs: use cases: add API automation by @g-linville in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/159
* Chore: Add csv examples, rework web browser usecase by @StrongMonkey in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/157
* fix: create done file in the right place by @g-linville in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/160
* Fix http tool lookups that are on the root of the domain by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/165


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/compare/v0.2.0...v0.2.1

name: v0.2.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Add tools distribution for python by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/121
* Fix panic with repos aren't used by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/123
* Add tools distribution for node by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/124
* fix: add clarity to azure usage docs by @keyallis in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/126
* Lock tool during repo setup by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/131
* docs: Update README-USECASES.md by @eltociear in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/133
* fix: sys.find: stop ignoring directories by @g-linville in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/134
* add sentiments analysis by @lucj in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/125
* fix: compare role against next message in conversion conditional by @njhale in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/137
* feat: Add golang tool support by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/138
* fix some typos by @studystill in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/139
* Add keep-alive stdin for daemons by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/142
* Add some helpful log messages by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/144
* docs: add car-notifier example by @g-linville in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/128
* Fix tools from repos referencing other repos by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/149
* Switch daemon url to gptscript by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/150
* Fix: update tablewriter library to avoid panic by @StrongMonkey in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/153
* chore: upload s3: remove files containing search results by @g-linville in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/151
* Fix: Use subPath as root dir when invoking runtime by @StrongMonkey in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/152
* Windows path fixes by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/154
* Recipe generator fix by @techmaharaj in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/122
* Add sentiment usecase by @cjellick in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/155
* feat: auto create directories when using sys.write by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/158

## New Contributors
* @lucj made their first contribution in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/125
* @studystill made their first contribution in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/139

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/compare/v0.1.5...v0.2.0

name: v0.2.0-rc1
body:
## What's Changed
* Add tools distribution for python by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/121
* Fix panic with repos aren't used by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/123
* Add tools distribution for node by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/124
* fix: add clarity to azure usage docs by @keyallis in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/126
* Lock tool during repo setup by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/131
* docs: Update README-USECASES.md by @eltociear in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/133
* fix: sys.find: stop ignoring directories by @g-linville in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/134
* add sentiments analysis by @lucj in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/125
* fix: compare role against next message in conversion conditional by @njhale in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/137
* feat: Add golang tool support by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/138
* fix some typos by @studystill in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/139
* Add keep-alive stdin for daemons by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/142

## New Contributors
* @lucj made their first contribution in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/125
* @studystill made their first contribution in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/139

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/compare/v0.1.5...v0.2.0-rc1

name: v0.1.5
body:
## What's Changed
* Don't set the working dir of tools by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/101
* docs: add basic vision tool cookbook by @njhale in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/83
* docs: separate shell command from output in examples by @tylerslaton in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/91
* feat: add a few helper functions for using code outside of this package by @thedadams in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/79
* fix: address typo issue with readme by @tylerslaton in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/106
* Add browser tool usecase doc by @StrongMonkey in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/102
* Add github metadata to internal data structures by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/110
* chore: add releases to gitignore by @njhale in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/111
* Chore: Add ability to save state message from each gptscript call by @StrongMonkey in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/105
* Add Scoop install to README by @sirredbeard in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/54
* Fix: fix incorrect log package by @StrongMonkey in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/114
* Add export parameter by @ibuildthecloud in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/113
* docs: add story-book.gpt example by @tylerslaton in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/99
* add example nodejs and image generation example by @cloudnautique in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/108
* enhance: add document summarizer example by @g-linville in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/107
* docs: clarify details about installing the image-generation tool by @tylerslaton in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/116
* Fix: use milliseconds to record state file by @StrongMonkey in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/118
* Check if response has a choice before debug logging to prevent null r by @darkthread in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/117
* docs: update story-book readme to have a reset step by @tylerslaton in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/120
* fix: generic azure model support by @keyallis in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/119

## New Contributors
* @StrongMonkey made their first contribution in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/102
* @darkthread made their first contribution in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/117

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/compare/v0.1.4...v0.1.5

name: v0.1.4
body:
## Changelog
* 954fa75b4cbef83645faa0e8e2d7f578cad0dc5b: Add Recipe Generator sample application to examples (#84) (@techmaharaj)
* 701b9c8eb5010110be284f0e71c44f44376e106a: Add vision usecase (#98) (@cjellick)
* 46e0f13e503b8c0bb01499997887b19bcc2155f4: Create README-USECASES.md (#90) (@sheng-liang)
* 3623521cce9bfe8de2fd855a12c936d860923a1c: Delete examples/edit.gpt (#87) (@cjellick)
* 7e00a8e42352ccfc397b42528b79b28a970ec123: Drop unneeded code as vision is being moved to a tool (@ibuildthecloud)
* 1db7708450034596d0169443226ab25b44ce8e74: Ignore common node and python files (#97) (@cjellick)
* 046d340784105f1a7e115ae9da64a4ed31cc6293: Refactor client code to make way for additionl AI API backends (@ibuildthecloud)
* 5a91c64055c24856dad11c7b884af88fd1e07b01: enhance - add sys.file.stat built in tool (@cloudnautique)
* c8eae2a8d45edd34c1943d092d6ea25b5ff4fc92: enhance: add support for azure deployment name mapping (#78) (@keyallis)
* 90e52e4c24982221166eb605cc732d304eb8fa90: enhance: synchronize file manipulation for built-ins (@njhale)
* a2daea4d7c2160c7fca09d545043b0519879a1c6: feat: add sys.append built-in (@njhale)
* b1db1e22b44f62e29476432a6742b808ac171aa8: feat: refactor docs and add content around tools and authoring (@tylerslaton)
* 0bafbaa45b45f677edaf2770c466ab83ceb1028b: fix: add a timeout to builtin HTTP functions (@g-linville)
* d4981fac8fbc705261f5cf9944db7a525421aec8: style: remove unnecessary log formatting calls (@njhale)

name: v0.1.2
body:
## What's Changed
* fix typos by @sebgoa in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/49
* Update count-lines-of-code.gpt by @eltociear in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/46
* Add WinGet install to README and WinGet package update automation by @sirredbeard in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/55
* Docker UI build by @vincent99 in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/45
* fix - typo in error message by @cloudnautique in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/64
* Check for http and https prefix by @sirredbeard in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/58
* feat: add documentation site by @tylerslaton in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/62
* fix - update hacker-news-headlines.gpt by @djcarpe in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/67
* fix: address issue with override param by @tylerslaton in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/71

## New Contributors
* @sebgoa made their first contribution in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/49
* @eltociear made their first contribution in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/46
* @sirredbeard made their first contribution in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/55
* @cloudnautique made their first contribution in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/64
* @djcarpe made their first contribution in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/67

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/compare/v0.1.1...v0.1.2

name: v0.1.1
body:
## What's Changed
* New example time gpt by @saiyam1814 in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/41
* Print tool descriptions in --list-tools by @vincent99 in https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/pull/44


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/gptscript-ai/gptscript/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.1

name: v0.1.0
body:
## Changelog
* 357da7b62fcfcb23093640dbdeab9cdf166aecc6: Mention built in tools (@ibuildthecloud)
* 5afe8b87c5f0e26c8cdd710aa730396cb0e7f712: More theme (@vincent99)
* a8552ea7913c99cf4398192c720d43d4a021c5c8: README Updates (@ibuildthecloud)
* a93db65e4be0d8383c3b38abcafa827661c6599c: Update client.go with a meaningful message to set openAPI key (@saiyam1814)
* 06541ffb71f1a0f64c8ba994b7c8775805a7e774: chore: enable manual runs of the push-quickstart action (@njhale)
* 7a42a5b4cda1b96e4db5f7bc7b96f47c72b40303: fix: enable ui in docker image (@njhale)
* c9397ffcdd684727c69ee0b98f352edb0c1c30c6: format (@saiyam1814)

name: v0.0.3
body:
## Changelog
* 2811bbb6267625e90a367686483cf947cdf28afb: Cmd-Enter to run (@vincent99)
* c1b9845f13af9640b2ad5d4fc681d4cf8cab8b54: Different threading, styles (@vincent99)
* 1e2ca840fcb0df959f0c3a7a7706feb0b8f81b64: Mobile friendlier (@vincent99)
* a3decda0ac3f080faa06658d8b1c810a42e989f1: Refactor Tool to break out parameters (@ibuildthecloud)
* 36e9d9dcc55543e0917644b47434213614d23ce7: Show run output (@vincent99)
* 6c44c7d26de109523c211d4519874e05991b18dd: Theme (@vincent99)
* bb812885eee41c4bce91ad62ddd0ad32804de9b6: Update examples (@ibuildthecloud)
* 7403431d849c6d439be5281fce235b54444b3e64: Use localTools to get tool options (@vincent99)
* 8b4d59a838b688528f3cb9f9258314ccd38a0dca: chore: add install script (@njhale)
* d649f47aecd568440c0888e219e31082c82ea5c2: chore: add workflow_dispatch to workflow for troubleshooting (@drpebcak)
* 5144ce1f24856de21a625cc8e73e74b822497c34: chore: send artifacts to r2 bucket (@drpebcak)
* 32b6ba0e9170777df822203443fd94bc0e87f285: fix: ensure embedded ui fs is populated before ci builds (@njhale)
* c070da98e84501e5077183f1795a5a7bbea6c413: fix: use correct env var for endpoint, change secrets to reference r2 (@drpebcak)
* e9ba11e656272890f83e56b67bd176b2b6142fb1: yarn->npm (@vincent99)

name: v0.0.2
body:
## Changelog
* 96cb5ad9918fd8dfc8b7e48b03ebaca1e7ba29e5: Add a couple examples (@g-linville)
* 8e9efff0b078cec03c2939253e034b3dd93a7a1e: Add command for first example (@ibuildthecloud)
* 9af903f61c908e0aa1eb7a85d0c9450f609002a9: Add program name (@ibuildthecloud)
* 90a63c44f426467cd47c45e0eb7999ded57d1e92: Add sys.download (@ibuildthecloud)
* c558ca5299cdea231a7b333711666ba144454627: Add sys.remove (@ibuildthecloud)
* 7f7ef6363e3d4b150b72ca3e5ffe0590c44bf611: Allow internal prompt to be skipped (@ibuildthecloud)
* fdd9404fb519479684cbe3378b0bcb2af7312126: Allow reading script from stdin using "gptscript -" (@ibuildthecloud)
* a136e12aeec2649ac90de5400b2ff86f69a2f625: Delete examples/tables.gpt (@sheng-liang)
* 51d17ef40f2a2bc99ff5cb3572c02bdc2b332862: Fix daemon support and don't default to 1024 tokens (@ibuildthecloud)
* 5174792790f8ce2f0aa67133fc534fcbf4ab30a6: Fix linting issue (@ibuildthecloud)
* a73140f18c9ac23e78e97b13dd59e39cf8527386: Initial README.md (@ibuildthecloud)
* e033668ae804c44de946aca6aa5b0892a6a4cdd7: Initial UI (@vincent99)
* e28e7b751b2bc2ee8e1a1841b88559aba6d96d2b: Print status of subcalls (@ibuildthecloud)
* b28a7d001e2796b7cb3de7b3ab2817d65f42c98f: Redirect / from browser to /ui (@vincent99)
* 3f6076b89cac68b573b73209e4f381ae58d36457: Small readme updates (@ibuildthecloud)
* c2bdae94a271fd3fa4510a8cddefe1edff605033: Update LICENSE copyright (@ibuildthecloud)
* 1b0514645d5ca70b673de545e8d5e35f3e264846: Update actions to not complain about node verison (@vincent99)
* f1850a2d79d05a5ecca1b685d09b03a3b87fa6cc: chore: add docker build ci (@njhale)
* a145d5b206f0df54908ee9bbdff784657bb9739d: chore: generate versioned brew formulae (@njhale)
* b1bba71ac34ab1e9c718498d31cf8db9c2299a51: chore: go back to publishing only the latest version to brew (@njhale)
* f4751f450a78fd44d7a715475312f55a02ad822d: chore: temporarily disable docker ci (@njhale)
* 7321fb20d779df84503010db6f67c7a777202222: chore: upload release and main builds to s3 (@njhale)
* fa863df58af91c3f6eaa03ab4c4919521e71338b: enhance: enable shell completions (@njhale)
* 90011f7260bb973918979465a71661580e697504: feat: add travel-agent example (@tylerslaton)
* 8c6394bf6b098b27967bbc428ba2f95a966df3e6: fix: add revive lint and fix related issues (@thedadams)

name: v0.0.1
body:
## Changelog
* 86387edf5c229ff2d34a3b83206bbeb3e75b8bf0: Add --list-tools (@ibuildthecloud)
* cbf8dcf5bac5f70c6ee81afe2f44a78b751d6836: Add /sys and /*.gpt (@ibuildthecloud)
* 4c8085ac58ef8394d86168790842da225a9a959e: Add ?tool param (@ibuildthecloud)
* 4a81d2bdda3af199adf8e0091117ad074b25d44d: Add Model responding message (@ibuildthecloud)
* 76385e08f5f56a14d8ad9aa4a4bcfa835000350e: Add args and url loading (@ibuildthecloud)
* 231b4f072e64bebc27f4a80ad813b03492707f3f: Add chatID to logs (@ibuildthecloud)
* 18da184c611d6aa8cd0b224fdfc013487b358367: Add file loading from github (@ibuildthecloud)
* 5a7ebe0f5b2831960a517c5150127fe0968dfdc8: Add find and exec (@ibuildthecloud)
* 0b88314d5a2f35a4ab5f8de39d292a431dd0d27c: Add initial http and daemon support. Add nocache flag (@ibuildthecloud)
* b5f198e047ca864c153ebd11f0eb4f6a3b0922e6: Add logging for commands (@ibuildthecloud)
* 8f2f4f920516c2873bbb10de7a8dbba6c9afc963: Add renovate.json (@renovate[bot])
* b57117aa6dec3fa72fe18a4f658b0b02c5263ac4: Add server (@ibuildthecloud)
* ed39111acdd44ce3ad634c258a9e8295d015304b: Add support for serving UI (@ibuildthecloud)
* ce79ae089f7f562f7b5a577637721c1f9ed48fe7: Add sys.http.get and sys.http.post (@ibuildthecloud)
* c90355fe55fbfc567533137c16ce58d9d73b1e33: Add sys.http.html2text (@ibuildthecloud)
* 3871ee6793b6007d42dd31eea26c0cd96203b2a8: Add sys.read and sys.write (@ibuildthecloud)
* 3e094a7e62819a13b4612d9d62c00acf43a27f53: Add temperature and non-modified env vars (@ibuildthecloud)
* 840ac9761d03e951829a549a0aa86fe4d1a3b227: Allow embedding gptscripts in python files (@ibuildthecloud)
* 727668c999082fc2e11fe416ed746201a94316ab: Async response is JSON (@vincent99)
* afe765df0162cc3a4cfbc57a315e43d246ee816b: Attempt to make CLI output clearer (@ibuildthecloud)
* 199a582b0b3efd3b8c269f70646edd94377e5c04: CORS support (@vincent99)
* f82253a7834f4ead3f544191646985718f45f47e: Change output to be log based (@ibuildthecloud)
* 102ea13f4994d4eb71eb0a9f15cf8b69dc1085c3: Clean up log output (@ibuildthecloud)
* 4dace5c6091d0236d0094dde801bf7a58b67e221: Cleanup some tests (@ibuildthecloud)
* ae73de1f4155ff27f79e8b7eb3180b70a1b68dd4: Default port is 9090 (@vincent99)
* 8bd960db7155f28974b1af02db1314e94df9515f: Default temperature to 0 (@ibuildthecloud)
* 78917b285bd6d0630b55f4fe0ed21abf6397e9d6: Don't pass file to interpreter if it is zero length (@ibuildthecloud)
* 912d1b493ba89abec097bb34bfa1a210cfae9817: Don't set default prompt param anymore (@ibuildthecloud)
* 8b4029b761836661d63320e45a491c04ba364d99: Fix examples (@sheng-liang)
* 01273d58cfdbe90661b203906208ee68fe432033: Fix missing context (@ibuildthecloud)
* 7b6d1b9b2fcc693a24b107565e30497f33b965d6: Fix samples (@ibuildthecloud)
* 853c4c78f2837cff11bc6957f45b86b6448e34c5: Make http list call recurse (@ibuildthecloud)
* dffe7542912f636594297f4daabef30e475bc2d0: Make some APIs private (@ibuildthecloud)
* 361b26d2b5bb9f73a1a844e4f05b0206402cfcd2: Merge branch 'main' of https://github.com/acorn-io/gptscript (@sheng-liang)
* 2873222998fbcb2ac27332ceceec12997f24a5d7: More CLI output adjustments (@ibuildthecloud)
* 64be97b186ab90cc8826c2a074bec4d0f990f7c3: Refactor runner (@ibuildthecloud)
* 061cfc3d2d949dde1b455252f0b0ead81e11564e: Remove deepcopy (@ibuildthecloud)
